Depending on the type of terminology list to be created, there are different ways to do this:
New terms lists or found terms lists are usually created during the analysis of a document. An overview of how to do this is given in .
Exclusion lists can be created in a window as described in .
You can also create an exclusion list from an existing new terms list or found terms list. This is explained in .
Another general way is to create an external terminology list outside of , which can be imported. This is explained in .
